rev.diff:
Line 138: Line 138:
On the other hand, many self-proclaimed "software pirates" take pride in the term, thinking of the romanticized Hollywood portrayal of pirates and sometimes jokingly using [[International Talk Like a Pirate Day|pirate talk]] in their conversations. Although the use of this term is controversial, it is embraced by some groups such as [[Pirates With Attitude]].
On the other hand, many self-proclaimed "software pirates" take pride in the term, thinking of the romanticized Hollywood portrayal of pirates and sometimes jokingly using [[International Talk Like a Pirate Day|pirate talk]] in their conversations. Although the use of this term is controversial, it is embraced by some groups such as [[Pirates With Attitude]].
â
'''DDL Sites''' or Direct Download Sites are sites that index links to locations where files can be directly downloaded to the user's computer. Many such sites link to free file hosting services, such as [[RapidShare]], for the hosting of materials. <ref>[http://filesharefreak.com/2008/02/02/advanced-searching-for-copyrighted-content-part-iv-ddl-websites/]</ref> DDL sites do not directly host the material and can avoid the fees that normally accompany large file hosting.
+
'''DDL Sites''' or Direct Download Sites are sites that index links to locations where files can be directly downloaded to the user's computer. Many such sites link to free [[file hosting service]]s, for the hosting of materials. <ref>[http://filesharefreak.com/2008/02/02/advanced-searching-for-copyrighted-content-part-iv-ddl-websites/]</ref> DDL sites do not directly host the material and can avoid the fees that normally accompany large file hosting.
